FROM https://ssd.jpl.nasa.gov/horizons.cgi#top

2017-Oct-21

Masses in units of solar mass, rounded to nearest 0.0000001
Taken from wikipedia: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Planetary_mass

Velocities given in AU/day, must correct them to AU/year (divide by 365).
